+<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >
+    <solid android:color="#00cccc"/>
+    <corners 
+        android:bottomLeftRadius="5dp"
+    	android:bottomRightRadius="5dp"
+    	android:topLeftRadius="0dp"
+    	android:topRightRadius="0dp"
+    	android:radius="2dp"/>
+    
+    <stroke  
+        android:width="2dp"  
+        android:color="#000000" >  
+    </stroke> 
+</shape>

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@

+<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >
+    <solid android:color="#ffffff"/>
+    <corners 
+       android:topRightRadius="8dp"    
+        android:bottomLeftRadius="3dp" 
+        android:topLeftRadius="8dp"    
+        android:bottomRightRadius="3dp"    />
+    <stroke  
+        android:width="1dp"  
+        android:color="#000000" >  
+    </stroke>
+
+</shape>

@@ -1,11 +1,81 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
-<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
-    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent"
-    android:layout_height="match_parent" android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
-    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
-    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
-    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin" tools:context=".MainActivity">
-
-    <TextView android:text="Hello World!" android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
-</RelativeLayout>
+<LinearLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    xmlns:hyman="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity">
+
+    <edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903119.until.SlidingMenu
+        android:id="@+id/id_menu"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent">
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <include layout="@layout/net1314080903119left_menu" />
+            <LinearLayout
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:orientation="vertical" >
+                <RelativeLayout
+                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                    android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape1"
+                    android:padding="5dip"
+                    android:id="@+id/Title"
+                    >
+
+                    <Button
+                        android:layout_width="50dp"
+                        android:layout_height="50dp"
+                        android:id="@+id/button1"
+                        android:onClick="toggleMenu"
+                        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119button1"
+                        />
+                    <TextView
+                        android:id="@+id/title_tv"
+                        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                        android:text="消息列表"
+                        android:textSize="30sp"
+                        android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                        />
+                    <Button
+                        android:id="@+id/button2"
+                        android:layout_width="50dp"
+                        android:layout_height="50dp"
+                        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+                        android:onClick="toggleMenu2"
+                        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119button1" />
+                </RelativeLayout>
+
+                <android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
+                    android:id="@+id/id_viewpager"
+                    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+                    android:layout_height="0dp"
+                    android:layout_weight="1" >
+                </android.support.v4.view.ViewPager>
+
+                <LinearLayout
+                    android:id="@+id/bottom"
+                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                    android:layout_height="51dp"
+                    android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+                    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+                    <View
+                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                        android:layout_height="1dp"
+                        android:background="#dddddd" />
+
+                    <include layout="@layout/net1314080903119bottom" />
+
+                </LinearLayout>
+            </LinearLayout>
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903119.until.SlidingMenu>
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,101 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="50dp"
+    android:background="#95eeeeee"
+    android:orientation="horizontal" >
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/id_tab_new"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/id_tab_new_img"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:background="#00000000"
+            android:clickable="false"
+            android:src="@drawable/net1314080903119messages_pressed" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/tv_new"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="消息"
+            android:textColor="#00cc00" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/id_tab_address"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/id_tab_address_img"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:background="#00000000"
+            android:clickable="false"
+            android:src="@drawable/net1314080903119address" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/tv_address"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="通讯录" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/id_tab_notice"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/id_tab_notice_img"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:background="#00000000"
+            android:clickable="false"
+            android:src="@drawable/net1314080903119notice" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/tv_notice"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="公告" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/id_tab_me"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/id_tab_me_img"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:background="#00000000"
+            android:clickable="false"
+            android:src="@drawable/net1314080903119me" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/tv_me"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="我的" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+             xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+             android:layout_width="match_parent"
+             android:layout_height="match_parent"
+             android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119picture2"
+             tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903119.AddressFragment">
+
+    <!-- TODO: Update blank fragment layout -->
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:text="@string/hello_blank_fragment"/>
+
+</FrameLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                xmlns:fresco="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="100.0dip">
+
+    <com.facebook.drawee.view.SimpleDraweeView
+        android:id="@+id/customer_touxiang"
+        android:layout_width="60.0dip"
+        android:layout_height="60.0dip"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+        android:layout_margin="10dp"
+        fresco:actualImageScaleType="focusCrop"
+        fresco:roundAsCircle="true"
+        fresco:roundingBorderColor="#eeeeee"
+        fresco:roundingBorderWidth="2dp"
+        />
+
+    <RelativeLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+        android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:layout_toEndOf="@id/customer_touxiang"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/customer_touxiang">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/customer_name"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:singleLine="true"
+            android:text="大名"
+            android:textColor="@color/link_text"
+            android:textSize="16.0sp" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/customer_number"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:textColor="@color/declare_text"
+            android:layout_toRightOf="@id/customer_name"
+            android:singleLine="true"
+            android:text="(账号)"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:textSize="16.0sp" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/message"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="40dp"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            android:layout_below="@id/customer_name"
+            android:layout_marginTop="2dp"
+            android:text="最新留言时间"
+            android:textColor="@color/gray_text"
+            android:textSize="14.0sp" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/tv_lv_time"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_below="@id/message"
+            android:layout_marginTop="2dp"
+            android:inputType="time"
+            android:text="最新留言时间：2016-01-20 16:30:30:300"
+            android:textSize="14.0sp"
+            android:textColor="@color/gray_text" />
+
+
+    </RelativeLayout>
+
+
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,129 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="#0000" >
+
+    <!-- 左侧菜单导航 -->
+		
+	<RelativeLayout 
+	    android:layout_height="match_parent" 
+	    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+	    android:id="@+id/leftLayout" 
+	    android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape6">
+		
+		<RelativeLayout 
+		    android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
+		    android:layout_width="match_parent" 
+		    android:id="@+id/leftTitlebar" 
+		    android:padding="5dip" 
+		    android:gravity="center"
+		    android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5">
+		
+		    <RelativeLayout
+		        android:layout_width="100dp"
+			    android:layout_height="100dp"
+			    android:id="@+id/Touxiang">
+			    <ImageView
+			        android:layout_height="100dp"
+				    android:layout_width="100dp"
+				    android:contentDescription="@null"
+				    android:id="@+id/touxiang1"
+				    android:src="@drawable/net1314080903119touxiang"
+				    android:onClick="change_user_new"
+				    android:clickable="true"
+				    />
+
+		   </RelativeLayout> 
+		   
+			<TextView 
+			    android:layout_height="100dp"
+			    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+			    android:textSize="20sp" 
+			    android:layout_toRightOf="@id/Touxiang"
+			    android:gravity="center"
+			    android:text="username"/>
+		
+		</RelativeLayout>
+		<ScrollView      
+		    android:layout_width="fill_parent"    
+		    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+		    android:layout_below="@id/leftTitlebar"
+		    >   
+		    <LinearLayout    
+		        android:layout_width="fill_parent"    
+		        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+		        android:orientation="vertical"    
+		        >    
+		    
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/lianxiren"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="联系人"/>  
+			        
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/machine_room"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="机房状态"/>
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/sent_notif"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="发送通知"/>
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/set"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="设置"/>
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/about"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="关于"/>
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/zuxiao"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="注销"/>
+			    <TextView
+			        android:id="@+id/tuochu"
+			        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+			        android:layout_height="80dp"
+			        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903119shape5"
+			        android:gravity="center"
+			        android:textSize="20sp" 
+			        android:clickable="true"
+			        android:text="退出"/>
+			 </LinearLayout> 
+		</ScrollView>  
+		
+			    
+		
+		</RelativeLayout>
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+    <attr name="rightPadding" format="dimension"></attr>
+	<attr name="leftPadding" format="dimension"></attr>
+    <declare-styleable name="SlidingMenu">
+        <attr name="rightPadding"></attr>
+        <attr name="leftPadding"></attr>
+    </declare-styleable>
+</resources>

@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@

+    <color name="colorPrimary">#3F51B5</color>
+    <color name="colorPrimaryDark">#303F9F</color>
+    <color name="colorAccent">#FF4081</color>
+    <color name="link_text">#ff49b8ff</color>
+    <color name="declare_text">#ffbbbbbb</color>
+    <color name="gray_text">#ff999999</color>
+</resources>

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<resources>
+    <!-- Example customization of dimensions originally defined in res/values/dimens.xml
+         (such as screen margins) for screens with more than 820dp of available width. This
+         would include 7" and 10" devices in landscape (~960dp and ~1280dp respectively). -->
+    <dimen name="activity_horizontal_margin">64dp</dimen>
+</resources>

@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+<resources>
+
+    <!-- Base application theme. -->
+    <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar">
+        <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/colorPrimary</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimaryDark">@color/colorPrimaryDark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/colorAccent</item>
+    </style>
+
+</resources>
